div.p:
Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xiij die
nouembris quo supra

The saide day Alexander gray warnit lauchfullie callit ande
nocht comperit to ansuer to the borghe Strekit one him be
Androw monrow that quhar' he promittit to bringe hame ane
dispensacion to him eftir the Instruction gevin to him tharapon
and has resavit xl s' in part of pament of the samyn and has nocht
brocht hame the saide dispensacion and wrangis tharintill tharfor the
aldirman and balyeis ordanit Androw nachtj sergeand' to pas and tak
ane distreis' fra the said Alexander and latt it to borghe' agan and It
be askit and warne him to comper befor the aldirman and balyeis
this day xv dais to ansuer' to the said borghe as secund'
day of process'

Eodem die Andreas monrow fecit constituit et ordinauit magistrum Wal
terum leslie rectorem de mennivir et Alexandrum menyeis coniunctim et
divisim suos legittimos procuratores ad prosequendum plegium alias per ipsum porrectum
super Alexandrum gray penes dispensacionem et cetera Agend' prosequend' defendend'
promitten' de Rato et grato cum aliis terminis necessariis et oportunis

The saide day thomas hay grantit him avinge to James laysk
xxxix s' iiij d' to be pait at the law day next eftir yule
his hand' and gudis Souerte

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xvj die
nouembris quo supra

The saide day Jonhne low said' he wist nocht quhar' Dauid mairis
assedacion of his croftis was and hed' he it he wald' gif it

The saide day Jonhne low grantit he hed' nay clame nor thinge to
say to Dauid mairis Croftis Except' the braid' croft

The saide day Dauid mar' one that ane part Ande Jonhne low one
that vthir part was oblist be the fathtis of thar bodiis to stand
and abid' at the deliuerance and ordinance of Alexander red Jonhne
Colisone thomas prat and Alexander chamer yongar anent the haldinge
of ane assedacion of the said Dauid croftis quhilkis salbe
Suorne one tuysday cum viij dais and furthtgif thar' decret
tharanent and falyeinge ony of the said personis vthiris salbe chosin

The saide day thomas barry was feit be the aldirman and
mastir of werk with avis' of part of the Consale for ane
yer' fra Sanct Katheryns evin furtht for xxtj merkis
Jonhne rosale was feit ane yer' for xviij markis and
entiringe the saide day and Alexander Stut was feit for ane
yer' for xix markis entirand' the said day Item the
said thomas sale haue ane mark atour' his saide
fee at the wile of the mastir of werk

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xvijo
die nouembris quo supra

the said day Elizibeth' lichtone and canny Duncansone be
thar avne tonge graunt was in ane Amerciament of the court for the
brevinge and sellinge of viij d' aile et cetera

the said day the aldirman chargit Williame portar James Srachin
gilbert riburne In the tovnis nayme that thar' wiffis brew nay
aucht d' aile Alsua thai chargit the wif of Androw branche
and canny menyes one the samyn wis'

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxmo
die nouembris anno quo supra

The said day patrik nicholsone baxtar grantit him avinge to the
lard of Ogiluy Sevin pundis vsual money of Scotland for
certane quhet bocht and resauit quhilkis some he oblist him be
his handis landis and gudis ande be the fatht of his bodie to pay
to the saide lard of Ogiluy and haue it to him or vphalie
day at evin that next cumis but fraud or gile

head.add: Copia assedacionis de le Justice myll'

div.p:
Be it kend til ale men be thir present lettres vs aldirman balyeis
consale and communite of Abirdene to haue sett and to maile lattin and be thir presentis
lettres Settis and to maile lattis to our louetis Alexander Coupar and Johne of myle
ale and haill our Justice myll' with the croft one the Est part of the samyn
and the bank betuix the gate and the burne one the west part of the said
myll' with thar pertinencis for al the termes of xv yeris to be haldin and hed
ale and haile our said myll' croft and bank with thar pertinencis to giddir with girs'
pastouris and lesouris to sex hedis of nolt tua hors or meyris to the saidez
Alexander and Johne equalie betuix thame and to thar assignais ane and may nay
gretar than thame Self Induellaris of the said' burghe thar subtennentis and helpis
with ale and Sindrie I multuris fredomes commoditeis asiamentis and profitis pertening
or may pertene tharto the Entray of the saide Alexander and Johne salbe in and with
the said' myll' croft bank and pastouris at the fest of Sanct martyne
next and immediate thareftir follouing the date of thir lettres And frathin
furtht to continew in peciable' Josin and breukin the samyn quhil ale
the termes of fyftene yeris haile and togiddir be fullely complet and runnyn
but ony Interrupcion or breik of termes or yeris Impediment or demand'
the saide Alexander and Johne payand' tile vs and our Successoris yerlie Ilkan
yer' tene merkis vsuale money of Scotland' at thir termes eftir
follouing that is to say foure markis Sex s' and viij d' at Witsonday
next hereftir follouing And vj s' and viij d' defaltit to the said Alexander
for the bigin of the said myll' And fyve markis at martymes
next thareftir follouing and say furtht fywe markis at Ilkan of the
said tua termes quhil the said xv yeris be fullie runnyn for al vthir thingis
that may be askit or requirit tharof induringe the said termes And atour the saidez
Alexander and Johne sal bige vpmak and vphald the said mill' deuly as afferis
and leif tham wele soueralie and trastlie bigit at the vsche of the said termes be
the sicht and consideracion of the balyeis and consal for the tym And we the said aldirman
balyeis consal and communite sal warand kep and defend al and hal our said myll'
croft and bank and pastouris with thar pertinencis to the said Alexander and Johne and to thar assignais subtennentis
and helpis for al the termes of xv yeris as said is agans al dedlie al fraud and gil avay
put In witnes' of the quhilkis we haue affixt our commone sele to thir lettres at Abirdene
the xxij day of octobre the yer' of god jM iiijc nyntj and fyve yeris quhilkis sex
hedis of nolt ij hors' and meris sal haue pastouris of the common pastouris of the said' burghe
with fre vsche ande Entray but fraude or gile
Vniuersis ad quorum noticiam presentes littere peruenerint burgenses et

Be It kend tile ale men be thir present lettres vs aldirman bailyeis consale and communite of
Abirdene to haue Set and to maile lattin and be thir present lettres Settis and to maile
lattis tile our louet frendis patrik clerk William belty and Richard Redhed burges of
the said burgh' ale and haile our vuirmyle vith the pertinence liande vithin the saide burgh
for ale the termes of threttene yeris To be haldin and had to the per
sonis thar ayris assignez and subtennentis nay gretar thane thame self'
Induellaris of this said burgh' one this maner The tane half
of the said myle to the said P and the tothir half to the saidez W and R equaly
betuix tham with ale and Sindrie multuris fredomes commdoteis commodities
asiamentis and profitis pertening
or may pertene tharto The Entray of the saidez patrik W and Richerd
was in and with the said myll at the terme' of Witsonday last and immediat
precedande the dait of thir lettres Ande frathinfurthe to continewe in
peciabile' Josin and breukin the samyn quhill ale the termes of xiij yeris
haile and to giddir be fullely complet and runnyn but ony Interrupcion or brek of termes or yeris
Impediment or demavnde to be maide in the contrar The saidez patrik
W and Richerd thar ayris and assignez payand' yerlie tile vs our Successouris
or assignez auchtene merkis vsuale money of scotlande at tua vsuale
termes in the yer' martimes in vintir and Witsonday be ewinle porcionis
allanerlie for ale vthir thingis that may be askit or Requirit tharof Induring
the said xiij yeris Ande atour the saidez patrik William and Richerd thar
ayris or assignez sale deliuer the said myle weile and sufficientalie
bigit in ale thingis according' to hir be consideracion' of fywe suorne'
personis at the vschey of the said xiij yeris to the aldirman bailyheis
and consale for the tyme but fraude or gile And we the saidez
aldirman bailyheis consale and communite and our Successouris sal varand kep
and defend our said myle vith the pertinence to the saidez P W and R thar
ayris assignez and subtennentis for the termes of xiiij yeris as said Is as
agannis ale deidlie ale fraude and gile avay put In witnes of the quhilkis
we haue hungin our commone Seile to thir lettres at Abirdene the xvj day
of august the yer' of god jM iiijc nyntj and Sex yeris

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxvij die
mensis nouembris quo supra coram Alexandro chamer preposito Andrea culan seniore thome fif thome
leslie balliuis

Eodem die Johannes arthour amerciatur per assisam Juratam ex ore Johannis colison'
prelocutoris assise pro perturbio vigilum burgi ac pro perturbio Johannis ramsay
quibus emendabit ut Jura volunt

Eodem die Johannes blak amerciatur pro perturbio Johannis blak lip et Idem Johannes
lip amerciatur per pro perturbio dicti Johannis blak et quilibet emendabit ut
Jura volunt Et consequenter diliberatum fuit per dictam assisam
quod Johannes blak dabit j li' Cere ad lumen Sancti Sanguinus et ij
s' prefato Johanni lip pro emenda et cetera

Eodem die Alexander gray legittime vocatus ad respondendum plegio super ipsum per
andream morow porrecto pro presentacione vnius dispensacionis et cetera non comparuit
Igitur precipitur Andree nachtj sergeando ad capiendum districtum a dicto Alexandro et eundem
ad plegium dimitti si petatur Ipsius hodie ad quindenam premunire
ad respondendum dicto plegio tanquam 3o die huius processus

div.head:
Nomina Inquisicionis
Andree lyntone et cetera
div.p:
Johannes Colisone thomas prat Andreas murray senior thomas mar Dauid
mar' Johannes blak Jacobus Kennartj Donaldus Srathachin Alexander
liell Johannes low Andreas ancroft Robertus Cullane Alexander nachtj
Johannes chapman Duncanus smitht Richardus hill Junior malcomus
crag et Johannes Kintor Jurati dicunt quod quondam Willelmus lyntone
patruus Andree lyntone latoris presencium obiit vltimo vestitus et
sasitus de feodo ad pacem et fidem domini nostri Regis de quodam
terra Jacente in le futy inter terram quondam Nicholaij yonge ex
boreali ex vna et Communionem pasturam de le linkis ex australi
partibus ab altera Et quod dictus Andreas est legittimus et propinquior
heres eiusdem quondam Willelmj patruj suj de dicta terra cum pertinenciis Et quod est
legittime etatis Et quod valet nunc per annum xiij s' iiij d' et tantum valuit tempore
pacis Et quod tenetur in capite de Suppremo domino nostro Rege per seruicium
burgagium Et quod nunc dicta terra existit In manibus Jonete Sponse olim
dicti Willelmi racione sasine sibi tradite in coniuncta infeodacione pro toto tempore
vite sue

the said day thome chamer talyour' oblist him be the fatht
of his bodie to pay to Jonhne Colisone ane barrell of salmond'
Sufficient merchand gude at mydsommir' next hereftir follouing and
Jonhne Wormet dischargit the said Johne of ane barrell
of Salmond' acht to him

the saide day the aldirman and balyeis assignit friday that next
cumis to Jonhne low to preyve befor thame that he hed pait
aucht li' and xv s' for Dauid mar' In defalt of the said
Dauidis pament at the deliuerance of ane Suorne assis'
Jonhne Colisone forspekar

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem quarto
die mensis Decembris anno quo supra

The said day Jonhne Waus in futj grantit him avinge
to Androw michelsone ane chaldir of bark quhilkis he oblist
him be his hande landis and gudis to pay at thir termes that is
to say demi chaldir within xv dais hereftir and ane vthir demi chaldir
at pasche next hereftir and falyeinge tharof the price alsmekle' as
bark gevis

the saide day comperit Dauid mar' and schew him partj contrar'
to the saide Jonhne low in the action befor expremit and deliuerit
his resonnis and excepcionis agane him in the samyn

The saide day comperit Jonhne low befor the balyeis
and producit ane acquitance of sere William Rollandis quhilkis
follouis I sere William rolland procurator the chaplanis of the cathedral
kirk of Abirdone and collector grantis me to haue resavit full
pament and contentacion of the annuell' aucht out of Dauid marris
Croftis the space of fywe yeris terme be terme fra Johne low
excep ane terme that is to say xv s' pait be David mar Ande
atour thar is avand this last Witsondais terme and martimes ande
of the forsaid resait I discharge the said Johne low becaus'
he pait it of the said Dauid marris commavnd In witnes
herof I haue subscriuit this acquitance with myn avne hand at Abirdene
the xxviij day of nouember' the yer' of god jm iiijC nyntj
and fyve yeris And for the mair' Securite I haue procurt the
Sele of official of Abirdene quhilkis acquitance the said Johne
allegit his preyve that was assignit to him be the ak
obefor anent viij li' and xv s' pait for Dauid mar' And the said
David mar allegit the said' John falyeit in his preiw and askit ward and
dome tharapon and the balyeis for waknes of the court continevit the said
action to the decision' of the aldirman and Consale

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xj die
Decembris anno quo supra

The saide day the balyeis assignit the law day next eftir
yule to patrik chernside to ansuer to the borghe strekit
one his wif s be Dauid mar for the wranguislie haldin
fra him of fyve li' and iij s' becaus' the said patrik grantit
to ansuer' to ansuer the said borghe for his wif

The saide day comperit gilbert menyes and producit ane
protection grantit be our Souerane lordis hienes vndir his priue
Seile to Dauid menyeis And' ane letter of our Souerane
lordis hienes dischargeand' ale officiaris of distrenyeinge
of the saide Dauid and ale vthiris anent the discussinge
of ane dome be the court of burrowis anent ane half
nethis fischingis of the furdis In his absence beinge in
the kingis seruice and Reintegrat the said Dauid to siclik
richt of the said demi nethis fischeinge as he hed
befor his legacion and passinge in Ingland in our soueran
lordis seruice as in the samyn lettres mair' fullie is
contenit

the saide day comperit Jonhne low and requirit the balyeis
to caus' Dauid mar to Sueir' be his aithe quethir
he chargit him to pay the annuell' of his croftis to the
Collectour' and gif the said Dauid refusit to sueir' he
wald' suer'

the said day maly gillegandy was conuikit be ane
Suorne assis' Dauid mar' forspekar for strubulance of
Androw chamer et cetera gif euire scho committis ony falt to the said
Androw and beis conuikit tharin scho salbe Secludit out of
the tone

the saide day Alexander gray lauchfull callit and nocht comperit
to ansuer' to the borghe' strekit one him be Androw
monrow anent the hame bringin of ane dispensacion
et cetera tharfor the balyeis chargit Androw nachtj sergeand' to distrenye
and tak ane distreis' of the said Alexanderis and lat it agan and It be askit
agan to borghe and warne the said Alexander to the law day
next eftir yule to ansuer' to the said borghe as law will

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xviij die
mensis Decembris quo supra

The saide day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' sere Johne
ruthirfurd forspekar that thomas mar' sal deliuer j barrel of Salmond'
of this tovnis fysche to mathow branche and the said mathow sal
deliuer ij Ridaris of gold' to the said' thomas'

head.add: the copy of ane assouerance gevin to the franch men

div.p:
Be it kend tile ale mene be thir present lettres vs aldirman balyeis
Consale and communite of Abirdene to haue assouerit and be thir present' assoueris
in the law and by the law for vs Inhabitantis the said burghe mery
ebrey mastir vndir gode of ane Schip Callit cristofer' of Deipe
the said Schip merchandis Marinaris and gudis quhatsumeuire
beinge within hir' saiflie to Cum within the portis and bondis of
the said burghe thar' to remane and vys' thar' lesum merchandice
alslang as ples' thame Soueralie to cum gang pas and repas
for vs Inhabitantis the said burghe and ale actionis concerning vs or to be
movit to the day of the makin of thir lettres but fraud or gile
In witnesing of the quhilkis we haue affixt our sele of caus' to
thir lettres at Abirdene the xxiiij day of December' the yer' of god
jM iiijc nyntj and fywe yeris
